r.s: A effective,fast,stable log extension for PHP.
r.d: A effective,fast,stable log extension for PHP. - In the PHP project, for convenient record log - The default log directory and module configuration. - Specify the log directory and get the current configuration - Analysis of early warning framework preliminary - Buffer debug efficient log buffer, convenient - With PSR-3 Logger interface - Error and exception automatic logging
r.n: - Fixed issue #76 #80 #86 Fixed segment fault with PHP7. - Make memory usage more stable, and clear memory leaks with PHP5.* and PHP7.*.
